meanings.definition: To make a loud, harsh, grating noise.
meanings.sent1: The old door would arar whenever it was opened.
meanings.sent2: The rusty gate began to arar as it swung back and forth.
meanings.sent3: The broken toy car would arar loudly, much to the amusement of the children.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the machine seemed to arar in protest against being overworked.
meanings.sent5: The wind made the branches of the tree arar against the window all night long.

meanings.definition: A type of tree native to the Philippines.
meanings.sent1: The arar tree in the park provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The arar tree's leaves rustled gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The arar tree stood tall and proud, a symbol of strength in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The arar tree's branches reached out like welcoming arms to the birds.
meanings.sent5: The arar tree's trunk was thick and sturdy, a testament to its age.

meanings.definition: A type of resin obtained from the tree of the same name.
meanings.sent1: The arar resin was used in traditional medicine for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: The sweet scent of arar resin filled the air in the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The arar resin glistened in the sunlight, looking almost magical.
meanings.sent4: The arar resin was as precious as gold to the local craftsmen.
meanings.sent5: The arar resin hardened into a beautiful amber color, perfect for jewelry making.
